statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerIdentityInformation;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE identity_verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, date_of_birth FROM CustomerIdentityInformation ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerIdentityInformation ORDER BY customer_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT name, address FROM customer_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, address, phone_number FROM customer_info ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_info.name, activity_log.action, activity_log.login_timestamp FROM customer_info JOIN activity_log ON customer_info.id = activity_log.customer_id WHERE customer_info.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM activity_log ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customer_info ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM customer_info;
SELECT name, address, login_timestamp FROM customer_info INNER JOIN activity_log ON customer_info.id = activity_log.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM activity_log WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM suspicious_activities WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT full_name, email, country FROM customer_information WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT full_name, email, country FROM customer_information WHERE country='USA';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagged_customers WHERE flag_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM investigation_team;

SELECT activity_type, location FROM fraudulent_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_description, log_timestamp FROM activity_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
